headline: Host Hotels & Resorts (HST) Confirms Quarterly Dividend of US$0.20 Per Share
summary: Host Hotels & Resorts (HST) announced a quarterly cash dividend of $0.20 per share payable on October 15, which aligns with a boost in its stock price by 16% over the last quarter. Concurrently, despite a dip in net income amidst generally robust revenue and earnings growth, the company raised its full-year earnings forecast. Additionally, consistent with its share buyback strategy, the repurchase of nearly 7 million shares might have bolstered investor sentiment. During the same period,...
